ai-kv22.8:1.1_0: Do you recognize the following things as all?
ai-kv22.8:1.3_0: When the mind is stabilized, Sineru, the earth element flimile, and firewood become stabilized. Coming up, stirred up, and immerse their grass.
ai-kv22.8:2.1_0: Do you recognize the following things as all?
ai-kv22.8:2.8_0: “Reverends, though the eye is intact internally, so long as exterior sights don’t come into range and there’s no corresponding engagement, there’s no manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.
ai-kv22.8:2.9_0: Though the eye is intact internally and exterior sights come into range, so long as there’s no corresponding engagement, there’s no manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.
ai-kv22.8:2.10_0: But when the eye is intact internally and exterior sights come into range and there is corresponding engagement, there is the manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.”
ai-kv22.8:2.13_0: And they should not correct them like this:
ai-kv22.8:2.14_0: “The dimension of infinite consciousness has prevail over eye consciousness.”
ai-kv22.8:3.1_0: There are the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.
ai-kv22.8:3.4_0: So let those whose sense fields go to the body with the same features.
ai-kv22.8:3.6_0: So let those whose sense fields go to the body with the same features.
ai-kv22.8:3.9_0: “The body is intact internally and exterior thoughts come into range, so long as there’s no water. ...

ai-kv22.8:3.11_0: But when the body is intact internally and exterior thoughts come into range and there is corresponding engagement, there is the manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.”

ai-kv22.8:4.4_0: Are thoughts permanent, everlasting, eternal, and imperishable?
